text: My name is John. I am someone who never went to college but always thought about it. [...] College was just a lifelong dream of mine. I just turned sixty-four years old in September. I still thought about that old dream. Was it too late? I had lots of time now. Would I dare try? There was an Advant-Age Programme at the local University. I decided to step out of my comfort zone and sign up.
question: What is TRUE of John, according to the text?

options.A: He made up his mind to change his way of life.
options.B: He decided to go to college together with his children.
options.C: He signed up for a free tuition programme.
